item.title: Quality of Life Tips and Tricks - Burp Suite
item.description: Quality of life patch/update in the context of videogames is a patch that focuses on fixing bugs instead of introducing new content. New features in these patches are not ground-breaking but rather making the game easier to play1. I have been using these things to make my life easier. I am publishing them gradually and will refine them into one final page similar to the cheatsheet. This page also pairs really well with automation.
